String.string:
Journey back in time to Castle Aranea and retrieve the Eternal Crown lying beneath the {@linkcreature:469#501#Anea's Crate}.
[Crown is retrieved when clearing Castle Aranea.]
Retrieve the Eternal Crown and go outside.
The Eternal Crown is covered in rust...!
Deliver the Eternal Crown to Meren in Highwatch.
Show the rusted Eternal Crown to Halran in Erudar Command.
Empower the Eternal Crown with the Regeneration Stone. [Press key to open your inventory and select the Regeneration Stone.]
Speak with Meren, near the Erudar Command.
